text:
Rapperswil (Swiss German: or; short: "Rappi") was a municipality in See-Gaster in the canton of St. Gallen in Switzerland. It is at the east side of the Lake Zurich (Zürichsee). As of 31 December 2006, 7,601 people lived there.
On 1 January 2007 the municipalities Rapperswil and Jona joined together to become the new municipality called Rapperswil-Jona.
